text: Her swutelað on þisse cristesbec þæt leofenoð ægelnoðes sunu æt korstune hæfð geboht hine & his ofspring ut æt ælfsige abbot & æt eallon hirede on baðon, mid fif oran & midXIIheafdon sceapa, on kascilles gewitnesse portgerefan & on ealre þære burhware on baðon.
Crist hine ablende þe þis æfre awende.
Her swutelað on þisse cristes bec þæt Ægelsige æt Linncume hæfð geboht Wilsige his sunu ut æt Ælfsige abbot on Baðon & æt eallon hirede to ecean freote.
Her swutelað on þisse cristesbec þæt ægelsige byttices sunu hæfð geboht hildesige his sunu ut æt ælsige abbot on baðon & æt eallon hirede mid syxtigon penegon to ecean freote.

Her swutelað on þisse cristesbec þæt godwig se bucca hæfð geboht leofgife þa dægean æt norðstoke & hyre ofspring mid healfan punde æt ælsige abbod to ecan freote on ealles þæs hiredes gewitnesse on baðon.
Crist hine ablende þe þis æfre awende.
Her swutelað on þisse cristesbec þæt ælsige abbot hæfð gefreod godwine bace æt stantune for hine & for ealne þone hired on baðan on sæmannes gewitnesse & wulwiges æt prisctune & ælfrices cermes.
Her swutelað on ðissere cristesbec þæt ælfwig se red hæfð geboht hine sylfne ut æt ælfsige abbod & eallon hirede mid anon punde.
Þar is to gewitnes eall se hired on baðan.
Crist hine ablende þe þis gewrit awende.
Her swutelað on þissere cristesbec þæt edric æt fordan hæfð geboht sægyfu his dohtor æt ælfsige abbod and æt þam hirede on baðan to ecum freote & eall hire ofspring.
Her swutelað on þisses cristesbec þæt Ælfric scot & Ægelric scot synd gefreod for Ælsiges abbodes sawle to ecan freote.
Þis is gedon on ealles hiredes gewitness.
Her swutalað on þissere cristesbec þæt Siwine Leofwies sunu æt lincumbe hafuþ geboht sydeflæde ut mid fif scyllingam penegan æt Iohanne þam biscope & æt eallon þam hirede on baþon to ecum freote.
And herto is gewittnesse Godric ladda, & sæwold & his twegen sunan, scirewold & brihtwold.
Her swutelað on þisse cristesbec þæt iohann hæfð geboht gunnilde þurkilles dohter æt gode leofenaðes lafe to healfan punde, on ealles hiredes gewittnysse.
Crist hine ablende þe þis gewrit awende, & he hæfð hi betæht criste & sancte petre for his moder sawle.
Her swutelaþ on ðyssere cristesbec þæt sæwi hagg æt widecume hæfþ gedon ut his twegen sunu ætt ælfsige abbude on ealles hiredes gewitnesse.
Her swutelað on þisse cristesbec þæt lifgið æt forda is gefreod & hire twa cild for þone biscop iohann & for ealne þone hired on baðon on ælfredes gewitnesse aspania.
Her swutelað on þissere cristesbec þæt ægylmær bohte sæþryþe æt sæwolde abbude midIIImanxan, on ealles hiredes gewitnysse & ofer his dæg & hys wifes dæg beo se man freoh.
Crist hine ablende þe þis gewrit awende.
Her swutelað on þissere cristesbec þæt wulwine hareberd bohte æt ælfsige abbude ælfgyþe mid healfan punde on ealles hiredes gewitnysse.
& crist hine ablende þe þis gewrit awende.
Her swutelað on þissere cristesbec þæt ægylsige bohte wynric æt ælfsige abbude mid anon yre golde.
Þysses ys to gewitnysse ælfryd portgereua & eal se hired on baþon.
Crist hine ablende þe þis gewrit awende.
